name: deleteVmwareSnapshot
description: Designate a snapshot as expired and available for garbage collection. The snapshot must be an on-demand snapshot or a snapshot from a virtual machine that is not assigned to an SLA Domain.

location.description: Location of the snapshot. Use **_local_** to delete only the local copy of the snapshot. Or use **_all_** to delete the snapshot locally, on a replication target, and at an archival location.
